CustomField.formula: IF( encompass_By_EM__Interest_Only_Term_Months__c>0, Loan_Amount__c*(Interest_Rate__c/12), Loan_Amount__c *( Interest_Rate__c /12)*((1+( Interest_Rate__c /12))^ ( Due_In_Months__c * 12)) /(((1+( Interest_Rate__c /12))^ ( Due_In_Months__c * 12)) -1))
CustomField.label: First Proposed
